TopicTitle: VAB file didn’t save and craft stuck underground

Articles.Content:
After forgetting struts I reverted to VAB and my craft was now in the ground and when trying to look at the craft below the ground the camera would get stuck. I tried to look at the save I had made for it but it was no where to be found. 

Edited February 26, 2023 by Jaka741
Typo
I have the same problem.  After reverting to the VAB from the launchpad, the entire craft gets glictched in the VAB floor.  Even loading / merging a previously saved craft does not help.
Had this one as well. Started to manually save any craft before launch to avoid this

I don't have exact copies of crafts that went to underground and didn't. But I have autosaved project of craft that didn't went underground (AutoSave AKU 2023-2-26_15-21-53) and saved same project of craft that went underground (AkuMA). I don't know exact steps to reproduce this though.
This is link for dev team, it's contain both crafts:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P7RmJWhNbKAYAqn3LwWg5a4wRyPks9hj/view?usp=sharing
